name: Elderberry Wine
author: Jennifer Drury

ingredients.name: lb. sugar, dissolved in warm water

instructions: Wash and mash elderberries. Let ferment for 5 or 6 days. Remove solids by passing it through a thin cloth. Add the lemon juice, raisins and sugar to the berry juice in a 5 gallon jug and fill with water. Cover the opening of the jug with grape vine leaves, weighing them down with sand.
